alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southern Washington; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 11:59AM EST until December 23 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Southeast to west or southwest winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Herkimer, Hamilton, Northern Warren, Rensselaer, Columbia and Washington Counties. In Vermont, Bennington County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and some power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong southeast winds are expected to shift into the west southwest behind a cold front this afternoon into this evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southern Washington; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer
